channel.title: All News on TWH @ Utah
channel.description: Recent content in All News on TWH @ Utah

item.description: I am looking for PhD/Postdoc who are interested in Computer and Software Systems research. Please visit hiring details.

Congratulations! Our paper “Cpp-Taskflow: Fast Task-based Parallel Programming using Modern C++” has been accepted by the 33rd IEEE International Parallel and Distributed Processing Symposium (IPDPS)!

Congratulations! Our papers “A General Cache Framework for Efficient Generation of Timing Critical Paths” and “Essential Building Blocks for Creating an Open-source EDA Project“ have been accepted by 2019 IEEE/ACM Design Automation Conference (DAC)!
